name: LitMan Weight
description:
[quote]Latest Update. Dev Kit Version 634425.39906.[/quote]

[b]Allows to set Weight Limit from 50 to 10000000.[/b]

Default value in Game 70. Default value in Mod 2000.

Value could be changed by Admins with command DataCmd SetWeight [value] in console. To enter console press ~ (Tilde).

[code] DataCmd SetWeight 100 [/code] 

Best used with "LitMan Item Stack" or "LitMan Item Stack & Container Size".

Does not work with "LitMan Increased Weight". 

Support Channel on Discord: https://discord.gg/baMbNpt

I released all my Source files on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods if anyone wants to keep updated those Mods or release own ones.

If you would like to Donate feel free to do so on Paypal https://www.paypal.me/kasperaitis

Mod ID: 1341544207
changeNote:
Dev Kit Version Dev Kit Version 634425.39906

Updated to match the live game version.
